body.name: Head & Shoulders Clinical Strength Dandruff Shampoo Twin Pack, Advanced Oil Control with Refreshing Citrus, 13.5 Oz Each
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 28 mins
features: ADVANCED OIL CONTROL: 35% more dandruff fighting power fights Malassezia after 1 wash vs ordinary anti-dandruff shampoos
PRESCRIPTION STRENGH*: Made with 1% Selenium Sulfide for prescription strength* dandruff relief and flaking protection* flake protection vs prescription dandruff shampoo 2% ketoconazole
CLINICALLY PROVEN: Up to 100% dandruff protection* visible flakes; with regular use
EXTRA STRENGTH: Provides relief from severe dandruff and seborrheic dermatitis
MULTI-SYMPTOM RELIEF: Removes oil and flakes to relieve dandruff symptoms* while cleaning and moisturizing hair *with regular use
If you love our Head & Shoulders Clinical Strength Shampoo, check our new Clinical conditioner and out-of-shower dandruff treatments!
body.description: Introducing NEW Head & Shoulders Clinical Strength Dandruff Defense + Advanced Oil Control Shampoo, brought to you by America's #1 dermatologist-recommended brand. Our formula provides prescription strength flake protection (vs prescription dandruff shampoo 2% ketoconazole) and removes oil and flakes to relieve dandruff symptoms. Clinically proven to protect against flakes and dandruff, our shampoo is a great remedy for an oily scalp. Clinical Strength Dandruff Defense Advanced Oil Control shampoo is infused with refreshing citrus. Soothe your scalp and hair for a healthy, vibrant look you'll love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars twin pack is a great deal
reviews.reviewText: Head & Shoulders Clinical Strength Shampoo is a game-changer for those struggling with dandruff. The advanced oil control and refreshing citrus scent make my hair feel fresh. The twin pack is a great deal, providing long-lasting relief. Say goodbye to dandruff woes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kind of weird smell but works
reviews.reviewText: Weird citrus smell but it works for dandruff and thats what I bought it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I finally found something I help get rid of my flakes. I have very sensitive skin and have tried other products but this is the only one that’s helped so far. Not only helped but I’m now completely flake free, I even only use it once or twice a week. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works wonders, but smells pretty bad
reviews.reviewText: This is hands down the best dandruff shampoo that I have used, in that it definitely gets rid of my dandruff. The only issue is that it smells kind of foul. Fortunately, based on the severity of your dandruff, you may not need to use it every day. My recommendation would be to figure out just how often you need to use it to prevent dandruff (every few days, every week, every month, etc.) and then use something that smells better on other days to cover the scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great scent, no more flakes. Would love a refillable option.
reviews.reviewText: I've started using this as my daily shampoo and I really like it. It doesn't coat my hair as much as the basic 2-in-1 Head and Shoulders so it feels cleaner and not so weighed down. It definitely takes care of the flakes and smells great. I wish more big-name brands would start offering refillable options for items like this, though. I would pay more money to waste less plastic but still get the products I love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The smell is not horrible
reviews.reviewText: The shampoo doesn't have a horrible smell like the bad reviews say. Its a pleasant smell but it does have a little medicated smell, but still pleasant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Life Changer, No More Itchy Scalp.
reviews.reviewText: I used Loreal before and after they changed their shampoo&cond formulas, my scalp was SUPER ITCHY, greasy, dandruff, small/big flake all over place. If u’ve been in this situation you’d understand how annoying it is. So, at first, I thought it was due to some biological issues (like hormone changing or stress, water etc) turned out it wasnt my problem BUT THE SHAMPOO AND COND themselves. And after researching for so many times, I chose this Head and Shoulders clinical shampoo, with doubt and prayed for a good result. And Surprisingly!!!! It WORKS SO WELL!!! No more itchy scalp, a super clean and relief scalp, less hair loss, stronger hair strains, however, without cond. my hair is still greasy so I use other brand’s condition to help my hair smoother. It works as well.For this product, to be honest, I don’t like the smell though, but regardless of it, I’M HAPPY with the outcome and thank you to the people who created and made this product available for struggle users like me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well but horrible smell
reviews.reviewText: Its cheaper that Nizoral and you get the same results but it smells like ocean. I dont know how they perfectly matched the smell of venice beach but they did it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Did little to clear up my flaking etc and irritated my scalp.
